input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Encouragement level has a direct effect on studying habit and exam score. Studying habit has a direct effect on exam score. The overall probability of encouragement is 91%. The probability of discouragement and high exam score is 5%. The probability of encouragement and high exam score is 41%. Is the chance of high exam score larger when observing encouragement?
